description: Custom-Built Zero- Till Plot Seeder with adjustable Row Spacing
full_summary:
# [01586-230095 C - Custom Plot Seeder](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18377227?extsite=MTgzNzcyMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
=============================================

Tender Reference: WS4279226925-Doc4372266103

### Tender Summary

This tender announcement is for the procurement of a custom-built Zero-till plot seeder with adjustable row spacing (22.86 cm to 68.58 cm) for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

### Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4279226925
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-12-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-28 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: 2023-12-28
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-11-11
* Tender Status: Cancelled

### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: GD
* Procurement Method: Competitive
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Deliverables
The successful bidder will be required to deliver one (1) custom-built Zero-till plot seeder with adjustable row spacing for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

### Contact Information
* Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Nancy Baessler (nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Bid Submission
Please note that tenders are available on SAP Ariba, and bids must be submitted by 15:00 EST on 2024-01-10. Any bid submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. 

### Note
This tender announcement is no longer available for bidding as the tender has been cancelled. Please contact the contracting entity for further information.  

The output should be in markdown format and should only include the important details. I've used 400 words to rephrase the text, feel free to edit if you need to. Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.
